nothing much

just some words

 

Aphorisms and such

I'm going to make a self-fulfilling prophecy and I'm going to love it.

What do you do when something is too good to be true and also true?

Where is there nothing rather than something?

Opinions without pi are onions.

More than fair is unfair.

Everybody seems to know what nobody wants.

A lot of what they teach in business school is bullshit, turns out that bullshit is actually very useful in the business world.

When someone says that you're worth your weight in gold, they're saying that gold is worth more than you.

Planning on going or going on planning?

Life seems like a likely story.

Humans fish for sheep.

Am I on a roll or is the roll on me?

I was playing the world's smallest violin, and it broke.

There are no spaces between spoken words.

I can't hear everyone all at once, or even twice.

I don't think you understand how funny I was.

A wedding invitation is an invitation to a wedding, not an invitation to be wed.

The wolf doesn't care if you cry wolf in the wolf's part of town.

You should think twice before you think twice.

There ought to be a mirror for every mask in the world.

I could care less. And I will.

I said I was keeping it real, but I didn't say where.

My will power has a will of its own.

You can be loud without being sound.

History does not repeat itself, history is repeated.

You were missed, largely due to the lack of your presence.

It's on the tip of my tongue, or somewhere in the general vicinity.

We, the idealists, are the real realists.

That's not long enough to be a short story.

Your intellectual property is stupid.

So, how many wrongs do make a right?

If I died, I would be very very upset. It would ruin my day.

Even time might not tell.

Slowly you put on shades of comfort, leaving yourself naked.

I'd love you to death, but I'm afraid it might kill you.

I don't disagree just to disagree; I disagree when I am in disagreement.

What I don't like about sadness is that I feel it in my heart.

Ideas are a dime a dozen and I'm out of dimes.

You speak of growing up as if it were in the past.

A lot of what you say sounds like something you would say.

I think I will go watch a tree climb itself.

False modesty is outright disingenuous. True humility is just plain boring.

Well, I'll be damned! And so will you.

People have small imaginations, the world is pretty big.

I once made a decision, but then I undecided.

Your reputation precedes you, and with any luck, you will depart before it does.

Life's life that.

It can't not work because it does primarily nothing.

I cannot tell the future, so I will let it tell me.

I have tried a lot of things and I find that I like wandering around and doing nothing better.

A metaphor is like a simile.

If you had nothing, what would you need?

I think night school is a brilliant concept, if you have nothing to do during the day.

The glass is fully empty.

I think I've been told that I'm an awful listener.

It is surprising, if you are listening, with how much clarity it can be done.

It's always one o'clock around this time of the day.

I like to start each day by waking up.

I'm funny beyond compare, unless you compare me to someone who's just as funny as I am, or someone who's funnier.

What I like about it most is pointing out what I don't like about it most.

Before you know it, you will have climbed the mountain you were trying to move.

Make it cut-and-dry, more cut and less dry.

I wish objects in that mirror were closer than they appear to be.

When I grow up, I want to be younger.

And what of those who steal fruit, just to taste something sweet.

If you always go for the kitchen sink, you’ll find yourself stuck doing dishes.

Repetition is annoying. I think I've already stated that.

Questions and answers confuse me, multiple choice is abuse.

That's a vicious cycle, we should just buy a car.

In a circle, all ends are connected.

Some sentences end long before the full stop, I hope you get to the end of this one.

I'm not selling myself short, I sell myself at cost.

Then -- for a moment -- I heard myself listening, and it gave me further pause.

Late nights make mornings difficult.

The suspense is throwing salt on my wounds, but not killing me yet.

I'm continually in a mid-life crisis, because you never know when it will end.

Brevity is the soul.

You'll just have to learn not to be hurt by the words I say.

We all need to get into a room, and miscommunicate.

I can lie with a straight face or with my own face.

If I had money to throw away, I'd keep it.

I can read you like a facebook.

I feel sorry for you, I wasn't apologizing.

What is the difference between the moments you want to live to see, and the moments you would die for?

You strike me as a person...

We're not having an intelligent conversation, you aren't holding up your end of intelligent.

There's nothing awkward about silence.

Keep your friends close, your enemies closer and your affairs closed.

Curiosity killed a cat, I killed four.

A slow and painful death? or a slow and painful life?

You have the eyes of the beholder.

I'll do it for as long as I no longer want to.

Love, and be loved? or live, and let live?

I need to think of nothing, nothing doesn't worry me like everything else.

I like working on something that works.

Just give me a second, while I try to regain my passion for things.

Two steps ahead, but three floors below.

What up's?

I'm not a good morning person, at least not in the mornings.

I'm not one to take a situation into my own hands, unless it falls into my lap.

Awfully incredible or incredibly awful?

It's not the size of the dog in the fight or the size of the fight in the dog, it's the dog that lives to see another fight.

A picture is worth a mini-essay.

You're getting to know me, you won't like me when you know me.

My opinion is better than yours, and so are my facts.

There's two types of people here, those who're smart, and those who think they're smart. what do you think you are?

I'm sorry, I don't answer rhetorical questions.

Laziness is the key to avoiding bad habits.

I don't know what you're thinking and why you'd think otherwise.

I promise not to be involved in any scandals (that don't involve money).

The only people who search for your name on google, is you or someone with the same name.

productivity - low, talkitivity - high.

There is no undo button in life, but there's definitely a redo button.

How much wood would a woodchuck chuck for minimum wage?

You'll be delighted to meet me, I know I was.

I'm sorry to inform you that you didn't make our short-list. You would have made it, but we ran out of space on the paper.

Are you still guilty if you feel no guilt?

What doesn't kill me will only leave me severely hospitalized.

When there's nothing to do, anything can be done. but sometimes somethings must be done, and at those times nothing gets done.

All I ever wanted was everything, and everything else.

Wow, a train of thought eh; I could fit all my thoughts into a mini.

What goes up will stay up, unless it comes down.

There's no pain like home.

I'm not as stupid as you look.

I miss my old problems, they were so easy to handle.
